content.rendered:
Monday February 3rd, 2025 

Today is a “B” Day 

 

Club Meetings and Information 

Time to order your 2025 Yearbook! Sales are pre-order ONLY! Use the link on the Maple Avenue Webpage or in the flyer sent home. 

The Maple Avenue Musical Club proudly announces its production of Matilda featuring 73 talented students from Maple Avenue! The show will take place on Friday, January 31 at 7:00 PM; Saturday, February 1 at 1:00 PM & 7:00 PM; Friday, February 7 at 7:00 PM; Saturday, February 8 at 1:00 PM & 7:00 PM. Tickets are on sale now through the QR code on the posters placed around school or online. Tickets will also be available at the door. The cost is just $5 for students. We hope to see you there! 

 There will be a student council meeting on Wednesday 2.5.25 in Mrs. Kerls room. 

International Club will be meeting right after school on Monday, February 3 in room 255. 

Attention grade 6 and 7 students: Join us for a Virtual STEM Information Night to explore the exciting course options in math, science, and technology at the middle school. This live event will cover program pathways information about math and science acceleration opportunities. The livestream will be posted on ParentSquare and the Maple website. 

The knitting club is cancelled for Monday February 3. We will meet again on February 10th 

International Club will be meeting right after school on Monday, February 3 in room 255. 

Redeem your LiveSchool points from February 4th to 7th. Orders arrive next week. Keep following the 4 Bs to earn more points and make Maple Avenue an great place! 

Wear your favorite jersey or team colors to represent your favorite team or sport on Friday 2/7 

Bagpiping club will meet today after school in P222. 

The Student Voices planning session is today during 7th grade lunch for students who are helping to plan the upcoming Student Voices event. 

Math Club will not be meeting this week. The next Math Club meeting is on Wednesday, 2/12 in room R232. 

 
 

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 
 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
